title: Failed to synchronize articles from SharePoint Online
content:
After you set up an integration with SharePoint Online, the synchronization job in Service Management (Administration > Utilities > Integration > Endpoints) fails and the following message is found in the <SharePoint Remote Connector>\logs\synchronize.log file:
The sign-in name or password doesn't match one in the Microsoft account system.
 

Cause

This issue ocurrs not because you have configured an invalid SharePoint account. Instead, the failure reason is that access to your SharePoint Online site has been blocked due to conditional access policies. 

Solution

Follow the Microsoft documentation to set the Access management for Azure resources option to No.
